list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a squalid and overcrowded urban street or district inhabited by very poor people.
spend time at a lower social level than one's own through curiosity or for charitable purposes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he bought some secondhand clothes, and slummed among the metropolis's underprivileged
